CustomField.description: The Relay CCID uniquely identifies a single Customer (end user) within the Relay platform. Every Relay Customer must have a unique CCID value. The Relay CCID value should never change for the life of the Customer.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Relay CCID uniquely identifies a single Customer (end user) within the Relay platform.
CustomField.label: Relay CCID
